attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to ask the goverment to change the way in which family law is operated family courts should be open and judges should be made accountable for their decisisions family court is based on proberbility but when there is no hard evidence or witnesses a judge does not have the right to say someone (normalley a farther)has been aggressive for example when there is no evidence to the contrary the family law needs a big overhaul to get things fair and equal.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
